name: Fellfall Arena
description:
Fellfall Arena is Offline Arena game,You will have great time here,because You have:

2 2vs2 Arenas

2 3vs3 Arenas

2 5vs5 Arenas

4 Different Ranks

And enjoy in the world off Arena,which means that You can find Coffee Bar south of Starting area,or go North to practice Yours weapons skills in North of Starting Area.

WSAD or Arrows-Movement

J-Attack

Space-Jump

Enter-Speak,Buy things or Equip the items.

ESC-Menu

GAME WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY SAVED WHEN YOU ARE IN THE HALL WHERE ARE MERCHANTS AND ARENA MASTER.YOU CAN PLAY WITH ONLY 1 CHARACTER PER 1 PC!

-In order to download game,just press on "No thanks, just take me to the downloads",the first window is only if You want to support my work.
